data: Teagan’s Arcade stood, and in the slow upward progress of the city it may still stand, at that intersection of Broadway and Columbus Avenue, where the grumbling subway and the roaring elevated meet at Lincoln Square.
Teagan’s Arcade | Broadway | Columbus Avenue | Lincoln Square
Broadway and Columbus Avenue intersection | Lincoln Square
The Woman Gives: A Story of Regeneration
